admin.title: Steam SSO
admin.quick-start.title: Quick start
admin.quick-start.screen: You will be shown a screen with your API key.
admin.quick-start.values: You can set these values in two ways
admin.quick-start.form: Use the form below (this behavior overrides environment variables)
admin.quick-start.restart: Save and restart NodeBB via the ACP toolbar.
admin.sign-up-disable-info: Registration restriction means that only registered users can associate their account with this single sign-on policy. This limitation is useful if you have users bypassing registration controls using social media accounts, or if you want to use NodeBB's registration queue.
admin.prevent-deauth: Disable the ability to unlink a Steam account
admin.prevent-deauth-info: Disable the ability to unlink a Steam account.
admin.alert.save-success: Please rebuild and restart NodeBB to apply these settings, or click on this warning to do so.
